Name: apple
Definition: A common, round fruit produced by the tree Malus domestica, cultivated in temperate climates.

Name: pear
Definition: An edible fruit produced by the pear tree, similar to an apple but typically elongated towards the stem.

Name: car
Definition: A wheeled vehicle that moves independently, with at least three wheels, powered mechanically, steered by a driver and mostly for personal transportation.

Name: phone
Definition: A device for transmitting conversations and other sounds in real time across distances, now often a small portable unit also capable of running software etc.
